title: New Client Bug - Loss of Connection to Server
body:
So I was on league with friends when my client told me that I was having problems with my connection. I was then told to either restart or shutdown the client. I hit restart and when i went to log in it gave me the same message. Is this problem in relation to the login bug occurring right now?
I have attached an image of the message I am receiving .

Sorry Riot I thought this belonged in the bug session so I have moved it to the proper discussion as recommended.

replies.body: Per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page, there were server problems last night.  Everything looks okay now, and you should be able to login!  Let me know if that's not the case for you.

Alright so I found a way that you can do it

PC:
1. Navigate to toolbar and right click the client icon and click "close window".
2. When league asks you if you want to exit, click no
3. Connection error should go away

Mac:
1. go do your doc and right click league client icon and click quit
2. When league asks you if you want to exit, click no
3. Connection error should go away

That worked for me

Update: I tried launching the legacy client both from the new client launcher password screen and directly from the League of Legends folder. Took a few times as I was getting an HTTP error also saying I wasn't connected. I did finally get into the legacy launcher and was able to play the game.
If you cannot click the link in the new client at the bottom right to load the Legacy Client you can go to the Riot Games--->League of Legends--->lol.launcher 
This will also load up the legacy client.

Check this thread. Fixed the issue for me and my friend: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/uQqoGVbw-cant-log-in-heres-a-fix

Me and two of my friends are also getting this same issue. Restarting the client just keeps giving me the same error. I have only the options to Restart and Shutdown and either way the issue persists.
